data.actual_result: The settings page appears above the server list and gets cutoff, when it could fit beside the list
data.expected_result: The settings page should show up directly next to the server list (its shorter than the server list so it should fit)
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a game - Enable overlay - Make sure game is detected by discord - Enable overlay for that game - Go to game and open overlay - Drag server list to bottom-left corner - Click Settings - Observe (only happens with shorter monitors, mine is 1360x768)
